description: a(n) = least k such that tan(k) < tan(a(n-1)), for n >= 1, with a(0) = 0.
prog: (PARI) a(nn) = {last = 0; lastk = 0; print1(lastk, ", "); for (i=1, nn, k = lastk; while (tan(k) >= last, k++;); print1(k, ", "); last = tan(k); lastk = k;);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 23 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
